name: Squadron 2
baseAirport: RHV -Reid-Hillview of Santa Clara County Airport
about: Squadron 2 Flying Club, located at Reid Hillview Airport in San Jose, California, is a premier flight training institution founded in 1973. We offer both Part 61 and Part 141 flight training programs, catering to a wide range of training needs, from private pilot certificates to commercial and instrument ratings. Our fleet includes a variety of aircraft such as Cessna, Piper, and Beechcraft, all maintained by highly skilled on-site mechanics. Our team of professional instructors, led by Chief Pilot Clayton Conrad, provides personalized training to accommodate busy schedules. Members can schedule aircraft rentals 24/7 online, making it convenient for weekend getaways or long trips. With a focus on safety and economical flying, Squadron 2 is the ideal choice for aspiring pilots and aviation enthusiasts. Contact us at 408.648.2008 or visit our website for more information.
